Hi Ken,
thanks for the answer. Maybe I have not understood all the backgrou=
nd.
What I tried to explain is that looking the code the substrate simply
g=
enerates the connections for a static structure network. So, in a
simple wa=
y, I was thinking if using it as an activation function (in
this case it wi=
ll have one input and one output) would have given some
result.
The connect=
ion in the network would be fixed, giving a "hierarchy" in
the list of inpu=
t, and the substrate (as activation function) would
generate the complexity=
. But maybe is not in this way :P

Luca
